title: Can't launch legacy client
body:
Whenever I click "Launch legacy client" it brings up a window and says "PVP.net Patcher Kerner has stopped working" and it makes me close the entire program...what can i do?

Edit: 112 views and no one knows a solution??? come on now.... -___-

replies.body:
Try this:

1. Open up your Hard Drive. It should be called something like _"Local Disk (C:)"_

2. Go to the folder _Riot Games_  then _League of Legends_

3. Scroll down until you find _"lol.launcher.admin"_ and open it.

Let me know if this doesn't work and we can look into some other solutions :)
